name: Flower Plant
title: A beautiful flowering plant perfect for any room..

name: Aloe Vera
title: A succulent plant known for its healing gel.

name: Bonsai Tree
title: Miniature tree that brings peace and beauty.

name: Monstera
title: Popularly known as the Swiss Cheese Plant, it’s loved for its dramatic, split leaves. A tropical vibe for any room.

name: ZZ Plant
title: A beautiful indoor plant with white flowers. It also helps clean indoor air.

name: Pothos
title: An easy-growing vine plant with heart-shaped leaves. Great for shelves or hanging baskets.

name: Cactus
title: Miniature tree that brings peace and beauty.

name: Peace Lily
title: A desert plant that stores water in its thick stem. Ideal for sunny spots and minimal watering.
